languages.text: [Улыбнуться] "Расслабься, Мейв. Представь, что просто проводишь экскурсию своему хорошему знакомому".
[Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."
languages.original_text: [Улыбнуться] "Расслабься, Мейв. Представь, что просто проводишь экскурсию своему хорошему знакомому".

traits.locale_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."
[Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."
[Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."
[Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."
[Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."
[Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

languages.text: [微笑む]「落ち着いて、メイヴ。親しい友達にこの場所を案内してると思えばいい」
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

traits.locale_text: [微笑む]「落ち着いて、メイヴ。親しい友達にこの場所を案内してると思えばいい」

languages.text: [Lächeln] "Entspannt Euch, Maive. Stellt Euch einfach vor, Ihr würdet {mf|einen guten Freund|eine gute Freundin} herumführen."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

traits.locale_text: [Lächeln] "Entspannt Euch, Maive. Stellt Euch einfach vor, Ihr würdet {mf|einen guten Freund|eine gute Freundin} herumführen."

languages.text: [Sourire] « Détendez-vous, Maive. Vous n'avez qu'à vous comporter comme si vous faisiez visiter les lieux à {mf|un ami|une amie}. »
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

traits.locale_text: [Sourire] « Détendez-vous, Maive. Vous n'avez qu'à vous comporter comme si vous faisiez visiter les lieux à {mf|un ami|une amie}. »

languages.text: [Sonreír] «Relájate, Maive. Simplemente finge que le estás ofreciendo una visita guiada a {mf|un buen amigo|una buena amiga}».
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír] «Relájate, Maive. Simplemente finge que le estás ofreciendo una visita guiada a {mf|un buen amigo|una buena amiga}».

languages.text: [微笑]“放松点，梅芙，就当你是在带你的好朋友参观这个地方吧。”
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

traits.locale_text: [微笑]“放松点，梅芙，就当你是在带你的好朋友参观这个地方吧。”

languages.text: [Gülümse] "Rahat ol Maive. Yakın bir dostuna saray turu attırdığını düşün."
languages.original_text: [Smile] "Relax, Maive. Just pretend that you are giving a good friend a tour of the place."

traits.locale_text: [Gülümse] "Rahat ol Maive. Yakın bir dostuna saray turu attırdığını düşün."
